author: andreas
msg: Added link to create document to 404 page. It is now possible to create documents by providing the document ID to the usecase. Thus, it is not necessary to copy the content when the default publication is instanciated.

author: andreas
msg: Allow URIs as workflow schema locations. It is not necessary to copy workflow files when a publication is instanciated.

msg: if plugin is not built yet, go to the repository
